mapper.insert: insert into jw_renyuan (gonghao, shenfenzheng, xingming, xingbie, nianling, dianhua, zhiwei, ruzhishijian,chezu,jibengongzi, xueli, minzu, zaizhi, beizhu,fenzu) values (#{gonghao}, #{shenfenzheng}, #{xingming}, #{xingbie}, #{nianling}, #{dianhua}, #{zhiwei}, #{ruzhishijian}, #{chezu}, #{jibengongzi}, #{xueli}, #{minzu}, #{zaizhi}, #{beizhu}, #{fenzu})
mapper.update: update jw_renyuan set gonghao = #{gonghao},shenfenzheng = #{shenfenzheng},xingming= #{xingming},xingbie= #{xingbie},nianling= #{nianling},dianhua = #{dianhua},zhiwei = #{zhiwei},ruzhishijian = #{ruzhishijian},chezu =#{chezu},jibengongzi=#{jibengongzi}, xueli = #{xueli}, minzu =#{minzu},zaizhi =#{zaizhi}, beizhu =#{beizhu} ,fenzu=#{fenzu} where ID = #{ID}
